Module com.bytefacets.collections
Package com.bytefacets.collections.heap

Class ShortBoolHeap

java.lang.Object
com.bytefacets.collections.heap.BaseShortHeap
com.bytefacets.collections.heap.ShortBoolHeap
public class ShortBoolHeap extends BaseShortHeap
An indexed heap map, which allows for associating a value with an entry in a heap. This can useful for things like timers where you might associate some callback (the value) with a firing time (the key).

    • getDefaultValue

      The current default value.

    • setDefaultValue

      public void setDefaultValue(boolean defaultValue)
      Sets a default value on the heap, but can only be called when the heap is empty.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the heap has anything in it already

    • insert

      public int insert(short key, boolean value)
      Inserts the key into the heap and associates the value with the key's entry.

    • getValueAt

      public boolean getValueAt(int entry)
      Returns the value at the given entry. Note this is not range-checked.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if entry is outside the bounds of the underlying array

    • getValueAtOrDefault

      public boolean getValueAtOrDefault(int entry, boolean defaultValue)
      Returns the value at the entry, or a default value if the entry is out of range. Note that this method does not validate whether the entry is active within the heap.

    • setValueAt

      public void setValueAt(int entry, boolean value)
      Sets the value at the given entry. Note this is not range-checked.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if entry is outside the bounds of the underlying array
